page.title: 15Popular childrens' games.
page.content:
The most popular games played in our school playground are:
{Runaround}is a race game played by two teams placed at opposite corners of the playground.Each member runs in turn all round the circuit back to his team until the whole team has finished. {Bogeyman}is a skipping game with this rhyme:"As I was in the kitchen doing a bit of stitching,In came the Bogeyman and pushed me OUT".The child who was skipping is then replaced by another until everyone has had a turn. {Bulldog}is a fast game.The person who is on,stands in the centre of the playground and shouts "BULLDOG".All the others try to run from one end of the playgound to the other without being touched by the Bulldog.The last one "done" stands in the middle.
